title: 2025 Offloads West
comment:
A Liquid Robotics SV3 v300 Wave Glider was deployed with a towed Innovasea VM4-WG with the ability to offload Innovasea VR4 acoustic receivers. The glider is also equipped with an Innovasea MobileRX and VMT attached to the towbody with both hydrophone heads pointing backwards, an Airmar 200WX weather station and Liquid Robotics GPSWaves wave height sensor mounted to masts on top of the float, an Airmar DX900+ water speed sensor mounted forward thru-hull, and float-mounted Teledyne RDI 600kHz Workhorse Monitor ADCP and Seabird GPCTD+DO. 

The glider will offload VR4 receivers making up the OTN CBS and Halifax Lines.
contributor_name: Robert Lennox, Adam Comeau, Sue L'Orsa, Tyler Byrne, Hayden Wu, Ellis Keener-LaCroix, Matt Mar
